user_query: the world better. This is everyone's goal and Weniverse's goal. Beyond trying to make the present better. each of us has a duty to do more for future generations. As Brand said, it's not just gravity but love that goes beyond spacetime. If you agree that the contents of Weniverse can change the world even a little bit, you can participate in video production with membership. A lot of caffeine is needed for video production.
